rows.col_2: Publishable research design. Clear question, methodology, variables. Reviewed by academic.
rows.col_3: 1+ confirmed researcher affiliation at top institution (Princeton, Stanford, Max Planck).
rows.col_4: Complete data captured for all variables throughout production cycle.
rows.col_5: Draft accepted for publication or presented at conference.

rows.col_2: Solid research design. Minor gaps. Reviewed by someone with academic experience.
rows.col_3: 1+ researcher engaged in ongoing conversation. Affiliation likely.
rows.col_4: Most data captured. Some gaps in early weeks.
rows.col_5: Complete draft. Publishable quality. Submission pending.

rows.col_2: Research design exists but has methodological gaps. Not yet reviewed externally.
rows.col_3: Emails sent. Responses received. No formal commitment.
rows.col_4: Partial data. Framework exists but inconsistently followed.

rows.col_2: Research design is vague or incomplete. No external review.
rows.col_4: Minimal data collected. Framework not embedded.
rows.col_5: No draft or very early draft only.

rows.col_2: [Affiliated researcher, if engaged. Otherwise: academic with org design experience.]
